Text: i'm sorry for the slow upload time guys, I really am. Something's wrong with my wireless network and it keeps stalling out.

come on people, seed!!!

thanks for putting this all together!

I've already seeded 4x what I've downloaded, which isn't much at all... I've since lowered my upload rate until i can pull in more data. 

Ragnarxxx, have you tried tweaking your torrent software to prioritize users who are uploading more than leeching?

i'm not entirely sure how to do that on Azureus to be honest. I just switched over from ABC because it  was making my computer unstable. I did however get fed up and just ran a really freaking long cable from my computer to the router. Its uploading at 130 KB/S now, and you'll all have your comics shorty!

again, really sorry for the hold up guys
It's not stuck - Since I've completed I've been hosting this torrent for a while.. I have been banning IP's that are using Bit Tyrant though, or those who are not uploading.
9.cbr is missing!  What should it be?
Ah, I found this torrent which has them in a slightly better order with a few of the ones missing here: http://isohunt.com/download/21746546/marvel+civil+war
Thank you for uploading! I just thought you should know, though-- Civil War #1 (as numbered 8th in your list) is only the Director's Cut and not the actual original issue.
Captain America #25 is missing, as well.
